node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 女患者過去健康良好，與丈夫、兒子居於北角英皇道 560 號健威花園 B 座，每日早上 6 時至 8 時均會到「福慧精舍」當義工負責清潔，最後一日到佛堂為 2 月 22 日。2 月 18 日起出現咳嗽帶痰和喉嚨痛徵狀， 22 日起沒有上班。患者於潛伏期內沒有外遊，其同住的丈夫及兒子沒有出現病徵，將被安排接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The female patient has good past health and lives with her husband and son in Block B, Healthy Gardens, 560 King's Road, North Point.  She volunteered as a cleaner in Fook Wai Ching She from 6am - 8am every morning.   She developed cough with sputum and sore throat since Feb 18, and did not go to Fook Wai Ching She after Feb 22. The patient had no travel history during the incubation period. Her husband and son who live with her are asymptomatic and will be arranged for quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 2 月 18 日起出現咳嗽帶痰和喉嚨痛
node.remarks_en: Developed cough with sputum and sore throat since Feb 18

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 每日早上 6 時至 8 時會到「福慧精舍」當義工負責清潔
node.remarks_en: She volunteered as a cleaner in Fook Wai Ching She from 6am - 8am every morning.
